body:
Howdy,

The Officials/Admins and have been talking and have decided it time to add more prizes besides just the forum rank/in-game star.
So.....
We've decided to add the following prizes:

1st Place:
Forum/In-game rank, with Diamond donator perks
Private Scrimmage server
Something else coming SOON!

2nd Place:
Forum/In-game rank, with Emerald donator perks
Something else coming SOON!

3rd Place:
Forum/In-game rank, with Gold donator perks
Something else coming SOON!

title: New Tournament Prizes?!?!

replies.body: The team that won has disbanded shouldn't the private scrim server be passed down?
replies.body_tagged: The team that won has disbanded shouldn't the private scrim server be passed down?

replies.body: wow Private Scrim server seems actually pretty cool
replies.body_tagged: wow Private Scrim server seems actually pretty cool

replies.body: That private scrimmage is going to be cool and worth, ty
replies.body_tagged: That private scrimmage is going to be cool and worth, ty

replies.body: I think you should definitely consider my ideal prize idea.  A pair of lime leather boots given at random.  Avicuscarce is not only the number 1 source for avicus news but is also the number 1 best giveaway station on avicus.  Add leather boots to each of the top 3 winners, and a lot of people will rejoice.  They were extremely popular at the last giveaway.
replies.body_tagged: I think you should definitely consider my ideal prize idea.  A pair of lime leather boots given at random.  Avicuscarce is not only the number 1 source for avicus news but is also the number 1 best giveaway station on avicus.  Add leather boots to each of the top 3 winners, and a lot of people will rejoice.  They were extremely popular at the last giveaway.

replies.body: Just make sure the private server doesn't stay down most of the time
replies.body_tagged: Just make sure the private server doesn't stay down most of the time

replies.body:
I'm excited about 'Something else coming SOON!'

What about the Diamond etc. ranks? Are they for all players in the team? Are they permanemt?

That would be quacking crazy!
replies.body_tagged:
I'm excited about 'Something else coming SOON!'

What about the Diamond etc. ranks? Are they for all players in the team? Are they permanemt?

That would be quacking crazy!

replies.body: The tournament ranks (Tournament Champion, Runner-Up etc) all have donator perks. The tournament ranks themselves will always keep donator permissions, however the players with those ranks will change overtime.
replies.body_tagged: The tournament ranks (Tournament Champion, Runner-Up etc) all have donator perks. The tournament ranks themselves will always keep donator permissions, however the players with those ranks will change overtime.
